title: Velo’s Predictions for 2024: Pro Gravel’s Turning Point, Lachlan’s Next Adventure, and a Spotlight on Women’s Racing
content:
What better way to preview 2024 than to ask Velo’s editorial team for their predictions, hot-takes, and wild and weird theories for the season to come? Stay tuned through this week for our thoughts on tech, training, culture, and racing from the worlds of road, gravel, E-biking, and beyond. See all of the Velo Predictions … Continued

Read the full article at Velo’s Predictions for 2024: Pro Gravel’s Turning Point, Lachlan’s Next Adventure, and a Spotlight on Women’s Racing on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
